data.label: Show this text on the login page
Put all candidates on the list of speakers
Allow only current speakers and list of speakers managers to enter the live conference
data.helpText: Server settings required to activate Jitsi Meet integration.

data.label: Preamble text for PDF documents of motions
Separator used for all csv exports and examples
Show meta information box below the title on projector
Allow users to set themselves as present
data.helpText: e.g. for online meetings

data.label: Prefix for the identifier for amendments
Default 100 % base of an election result

choices.display_name: Sum of votes including general No/Abstain

data.label: Show live conference window
data.helpText: Server settings required to activate Jitsi Meet integration.

data.label: Hide internal items when projecting subitems
Name of recommender
data.helpText: Will be displayed as label before selected recommendation. Use an empty value to disable the recommendation system.

data.label: WLAN password
data.helpText: Used for WLAN QRCode in PDF of access data.

data.label: Connect all users to live conference automatically
data.helpText: Server settings required to activate Jitsi Meet integration.

data.label: Name of recommender for statute amendments
data.helpText: Will be displayed as label before selected recommendation in statute amendments.

data.label: Title for access data and welcome PDF
Show hint »first speech« in the list of speakers management view
Email subject
data.helpText: You can use {event_name} and {username} as placeholder.

data.label: Only present participants can be added to the list of speakers
WLAN name (SSID)
data.helpText: Used for WLAN QRCode in PDF of access data.

data.label: Begin of event
data.helpText: Input format: DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

data.label: Allow access for anonymous guest users

core/config.value: [Place for your welcome and help text.]

data.defaultValue: [Place for your welcome and help text.]
data.label: Help text for access data and welcome PDF
Line length
data.helpText: The maximum number of characters per line. Relevant when line numbering is enabled. Min: 40

data.label: Allow blank in identifier
data.helpText: Blank between prefix and number, e.g. 'A 001'.

data.label: Sender name
data.helpText: The sender address is defined in the OpenSlides server settings and should modified by administrator only.

data.label: Show submitters and recommendation/state in table of contents
Numbering prefix for agenda items
data.helpText: This prefix will be set if you run the automatic agenda numbering.

data.label: Number of minimal digits for identifier
data.helpText: Uses leading zeros to sort motions correctly by identifier.

data.label: Number of last speakers to be shown on the projector
Number of the next speakers to be shown on the projector
data.helpText: Enter number of the next shown speakers. Choose -1 to show all next speakers.

data.label: Default visibility for new agenda items (except topics)
Show orange countdown in the last x seconds of speaking time
data.helpText: Enter duration in seconds. Choose 0 to disable warning color.

data.label: Hide the amount of speakers in subtitle of list of speakers slide
Sort election results by amount of votes
Reason required for creating new motion
Title for PDF documents of motions
Default encoding for all csv exports
Preamble text for PDF document (all elections)
Livestream url
data.helpText: Remove URL to deactivate livestream. Check extra group permission to see livestream.

data.label: Number of (minimum) required supporters for a motion
data.helpText: Choose 0 to disable the supporting system.

data.label: System URL
data.helpText: Used for QRCode in PDF of access data.

data.label: WLAN encryption
data.helpText: Used for WLAN QRCode in PDF of access data.

data.label: Default 100 % base of a voting result
Show the sequential number for a motion
data.helpText: In motion list, motion detail and PDF.

data.label: Couple countdown with the list of speakers
data.helpText: [Begin speech] starts the countdown, [End speech] stops the countdown.

data.label: Email body
data.helpText: Use these placeholders: {name}, {event_name}, {url}, {username}, {password}. The url referrs to the system url.

data.label: Remove all supporters of a motion if a submitter edits his motion in early state

core/config.value: OpenSlides is a free web based presentation and assembly system for visualizing and controlling agenda, motions and elections of an assembly.

data.label: Default text version for change recommendations
